resources.string:
testnet2 (test network) is intended only for testing the network, checking the operation of transfers, tokens have no value and are not sold for real money.

mainnet - The network that will be launched after testing. Its tokens can be bought and sold on exchanges.

TONCommunity.org 的测试网络拥有更适合的网络配置和用户友好的界面，使更多用户轻松加入区块链网络成为可能。
